sentences.en: " You're back!'said Lily and jaundiced eye on him. " What do you want this time? "
sentences.cn: 讨厌地朝他看了一眼说, “ 你这次来想要什么 啊? ”

sentences.en: As this summary might suggest, realism has a rather dystopian and jaundiced view of the world.
sentences.cn: 正如这个简要的概括可能提示的, 现实主义对这个世界有着一种极力反乌托邦的偏颇看法.

sentences.en: But one does have to wonder why the publishers selected a jaundiced yellow for the cover.
sentences.cn: 但令人纳闷的是,出版商为何在封面上选择病态的黄色.

sentences.en: Don't look at people with a jaundiced eye and make little of them!
sentences.cn: 别门缝里看人,把人家给看扁了.

sentences.en: He had a jaundiced view of life.
He has a very jaundiced view of the world.
He has rather a jaundiced view of life.
sentences.cn: 他对生活有点儿怨天尤人的看法.

sentences.en: He has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.
sentences.cn: 他对所有这些现代观念都很有偏见.

sentences.en: He was still looking at the world through jaundiced eyes.
sentences.cn: 他仍然用偏见的眼光看待世界.

sentences.en: Jack has like jaundiced opinions acres which le these fation ideas.
sentences.cn: 杰克对所有这些现代观念都抱有相当偏颇的想法.

sentences.en: Jack has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.
sentences.cn: 杰克对所有这些现代观念都抱有相当偏颇的看法.

sentences.en: Physical examination confirmed that the patient was jaundiced and had mild epigastric tenderness.
sentences.cn: 体格检查表明该患者有黄疸及轻微上腹触痛.

sentences.en: The financial markets are taking a jaundiced view of the Government's motives.
sentences.cn: 金融市场正用一个偏颇的角度来看政府的动机。

sentences.en: The general watched the proceedings with a jaundiced eye.
sentences.cn: 这位将军以带有偏见的眼光关注事态发展。

sentences.en: To the jaundiced eye, all things look yellow.
sentences.cn: 黄胆病人的眼睛里, 什么都是黄的.

phrases.tran_cn: 梗阻性黄疸；阻塞性黄疸

trans.tran_cn: 患黄疸病（似）的，因嫉妒等而有偏见的
黄疸病( jaundice的过去式和过去分词 )，偏见
